title: Drawing, "Design for andiron", 1800–25
medium: Brush and yellow, red, green, black watercolor, pen and black ink, on cream laid paper
inscribed: Lower center, pen and brown ink: 46174 Dans genre; graphite: 115a 120f
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Horizontal design, two pilasters, center panel. Large pitcher at left, low bowl with flame at right. Front of pilasters decorated with two-handled pitchers. Elongated front panel shows two fantastic swans flanking a stylized pineapple surrounded by a leaf motif.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for andiron", 1800–25.
1800–25. Brush and yellow, red, green, black watercolor, pen and black ink, on cream laid paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-160.
